Type.description: The type of the invoice (e.g., Sales, Purchase)

Contact.description: Details of the contact associated with the invoice

DueDate.description: The due date of the invoice

Status.description: The status of the invoice (e.g., Draft, Sent, Paid)

LineAmountTypes.description: Line amount types used in the invoice

LineItems.description: List of line items included in the invoice

SubTotal.description: The subtotal amount of the invoice

TotalTax.description: The total tax amount on the invoice

Total.description: The total amount of the invoice

TotalDiscount.description: The total discount applied on the invoice

UpdatedDateUTC.description: The last updated date and time of the invoice

CurrencyCode.description: The currency code used for the invoice

CurrencyRate.description: The exchange rate from the invoice currency to the organization's base currency

InvoiceID.description: The unique ID of the invoice

Reference.description: Reference information associated with the invoice

BrandingThemeID.description: The ID of the branding theme used for the invoice

Url.description: The URL link to access the invoice online

SentToContact.description: Indicates if the invoice has been sent to the contact

ExpectedPaymentDate.description: The expected payment date for the invoice

PlannedPaymentDate.description: The planned payment date for the invoice

HasAttachments.description: Indicates if the invoice has attachments

AmountDue.description: The amount due on the invoice

AmountPaid.description: The amount already paid on the invoice

FullyPaidOnDate.description: The date when the invoice was fully paid

AmountCredited.description: The amount credited on the invoice

DueDateString.description: The due date of the invoice in string format

IsDiscounted.description: Indicates if the invoice has any discounts applied

HasErrors.description: Indicates if there are any errors associated with the invoice

DateString.description: The date of the invoice in string format
